newsitem.title: UK: UK election - Conservatives 2; Labour 74-0019 GMT.
newsitem.headline: UK election - Conservatives 2; Labour 74-0019 GMT.

text.p: Following is a breakdown of the number of parliamentary seats each party has won so far in Thursday's British election and the estimated final tally of seats for each party, with 81 results in from Britain's 659 constituencies -
Average swing to Labour from Conservatives - 9.8 percent.
Projected final total of seats according to BBC estimate -

Exit polls released after polling closed at 2100 GMT - BBC - Conservatives 29 percent, Labour 47 percent, Liberal Democrats 18 percent, others six percent. ITN - Labour predicted to win an overall majority of 159 seats. Conservatives to win 177 seats, Labour 409, Liberal Democrats 45, others 28.
